courses.who_for: Missouri drivers who want to avoid points from a moving violation (eligible once every 36 months).
requirements: Court or Fine Collection Center must authorize
Complete within 60 days of conviction date

submission.certificate: Submit completion form to Missouri DOR Driver License Bureau and court if instructed
submission.reporting: Providers may submit to DOR; driver should also mail certified copy

court_vs_insurance.court: Avoids points but conviction still recorded.
court_vs_insurance.insurance: Some insurers may offer discounts, but not mandated.
